mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boarding(child_id, child_name, station_num, belt_status, boarding_status) VALUES(#{child_id}, #{child_name}, #{station_num}, #{belt_status}, #{boarding_status})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boarding WHERE child_id = #{child_id} AND TO_CHAR(up_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = #{up_time}
mapper.select: select * from boarding where child_id = #{child_id} and TO_CHAR(up_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE boarding set belt_status = '0', boarding_status = '0' where TO_CHAR(up_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.child_picture FROM boarding b JOIN child c ON b.child_id = c.child_id WHERE TO_CHAR(up_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') ORDER BY up_time DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM boarding WHERE TO_CHAR(up_time, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT b.child_name, b.station_num, b.up_time, s.station_name, p.parents_name FROM boarding b JOIN child c ON b.child_id = c.child_id JOIN parents p ON c.parents_id = p.parents_id JOIN station s ON b.station_num = s.station_num
ORDER BY b.up_time desc
